name: Droppy
description:
Droppy the Brave is a bold little drop of water who is determined to stop the local factory from polluting the environment. Use Droppy's superpowers, such as turning into ice or vapor, to help him save the balance of nature!

Apart from water based puzzles, this game hints at real-world physical principles behind Droppy's superpowers, such as states of matter, condensation, capillary effect and more. Hopefully, this game will make learning fun for your kids!

Art by a friend of mine. Music by: https://opengameart.org/users/syncopika

This game was submitted to Extra Credits Game Jam #3.
